## ruff

```shell
python3 -m pip install ruff
```

- https://docs.astral.sh/ruff/configuration/

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.ruff]
exclude = [
    ".bzr",
    ".direnv",
    ".eggs",
    ".git",
    ".git-rewrite",
    ".hg",
    ".ipynb_checkpoints",
    ".mypy_cache",
    ".nox",
    ".pants.d",
    ".pyenv",
    ".pytest_cache",
    ".pytype",
    ".ruff_cache",
    ".svn",
    ".tox",
    ".venv",
    ".vscode",
    "__pypackages__",
    "_build",
    "buck-out",
    "build",
    "dist",
    "node_modules",
    "site-packages",
    "venv",
]

line-length = 120
indent-width = 4

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = ["E4", "E7", "E9", "F", "I"]
ignore = []

fixable = ["ALL"]
unfixable = []

dummy-variable-rgx = "^(_+|(_+[a-zA-Z0-9_]*[a-zA-Z0-9]+?))$"

[tool.ruff.format]
quote-style = "double"
indent-style = "space"
skip-magic-trailing-comma = false
line-ending = "auto"
```

```shell
ruff format **/*.py
```

## mypy

```shell
python3 -m pip install mypy
```

- https://mypy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/config_file.html#example-pyproject-toml

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.mypy]

[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
# module = "<pattern>" # ex) "module.*"
# 옵션
```

### inline 오류 무시

부분적으로만 무시하고 싶은 경우에는 에러가 발생하는 줄에 `# type: ignore[<errorCode>, ...]` 주석을 추가하면 됩니다.

```python
a: int = 1.0  # type: ignore[assignment]
```

## pylint, black, isort

### pylint

```shell
python3 -m pip install pylint
```

```shell
pylint --generate-toml-config >> pyproject.toml
```

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.pylint.main]

ignore-patterns = ["^\\.#", ".*_pb2.pyi?"]

[tool.pylint."messages control"]

disable = [
  "bad-inline-option",
  "bare-except",
  "broad-exception-caught",
  "deprecated-pragma",
  "file-ignored",
  "invalid-name",
  "line-too-long",
  "locally-disabled",
  "missing-class-docstring",
  "missing-function-docstring",
  "missing-module-docstring",
  "raw-checker-failed",
  "suppressed-message",
  "too-few-public-methods",
  "too-many-arguments",
  "too-many-return-statements",
  "useless-suppression",
  "use-implicit-booleaness-not-comparison-to-string",
  "use-implicit-booleaness-not-comparison-to-zero",
  "use-symbolic-message-instead",
]
```

```shell
pylint **/*.py
```

#### inline 오류 무시

부분적으로만 무시하고 싶은 경우에는 에러가 발생하는 줄에 `# pylint: disable=<errorCode>` 주석을 추가하면 됩니다.

```python
a._b = 1  # pylint: disable=protected-access
```

### black

```shell
python3 -m pip install black
```

```shell
black **/*.py
```

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.black]
exclude = '''
/(
    \.eggs
  | \.git
  | \.hg
  | \.mypy_cache
  | \.nox
  | \.tox
  | \.venv
  | _build
  | buck-out
  | build
  | dist
)/
'''
include = '\.pyi?$'
line-length = 100
```

### isort

```shell
python3 -m pip install isort
```

```shell
isort --profile black **/*.py
```

- https://pycqa.github.io/isort/docs/configuration/options.html

```toml title="pyproject.toml"
[tool.isort]
line_length = 100
profile = "black"
skip_gitignore = true
multi_line_output = 3
```
